1. May this Christmas be bright and merry for you. May Santa bring love and joy for you that last not only for this Christmas but also for the entire year! 

2. Let this Christmas make way for a fresh new start for you. Embrace the many miracles it brings along and spread the love you have in your heart! Merry Christmas! 

3. May your heart be filled with supreme joy and your home with sweet presents. Let’s spread the laughter and cheers of this magical occasion. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year. 

4. May you forget all your pain and your enemies turn into friends. I wish a Merry Christmas that brings a season full of joy to enjoy and cherish forever! 

5. Let us be thankful to our Christ on this Christmas Eve for all his bestowed blessings that have sparked on our family! 

6. On this Christmas day, may you be surrounded with the love of our Savior! Great wishes for you and your family a very blessed Christmas. 

7. Christmas brings hope, joy and love as Jesus was born on this eve! May you and your family also be filled with these blessings. 

8. To a cheerful present and a wonderfully remembered past. Best wishes for an ecstatic holiday and Merry Christmas. 

9. I wish your family a Merry Christmas. Let this Christmas be one of the beautiful and you have cherished moments of celebration and joy. I send lots of love and good wishes to your family. 

10. I’m sure you must be having a wonderful time this Christmas season. Make sure you keep that happiness in your mind for the rest of the year as well. Merry Christmas.
